# Auvolar LED Lighting

> Auvolar is a B2B commercial and industrial LED lighting manufacturer and distributor based in City of Industry, California. We offer DLC Premium certified fixtures at wholesale/contractor pricing with free photometric lighting design.

## Company Information

- **Website**: https://www.auvolar.com
- **Location**: 17531 Railroad St Ste F, City of Industry, CA 91748
- **Phone**: (626) 342-8856
- **Email**: sales@auvolar.com
- **Shipping**: Nationwide from California — same-day shipping on most orders
- **Warranty**: 5-year standard on all commercial fixtures
- **Certifications**: DLC Premium, UL/ETL listed, FCC compliant

## Product Categories

### Indoor Lighting
- **UFO High Bay**: 100W-240W, 15,000-36,000 lumens, from $69 — warehouses, gyms, manufacturing
- **Linear High Bay**: 165W-220W — racking aisles, assembly lines
- **LED Troffer**: 2x2 and 2x4, 30-50W — offices, schools, retail
- **Flat Panel**: 1x4 and 2x4, 30-50W — modern offices, healthcare
- **LED Tube T8/T5**: 4ft and 8ft, 15-42W — fluorescent replacement
- **Strip/Wrap Light**: 4ft, 32-40W — utility areas, workshops
- **Vapor Tight**: 4ft-8ft, 40-80W, IP65 — car washes, food processing, freezers
- **Downlight**: 4"-8", 10-30W — lobbies, corridors, retail
- **Canopy/Garage**: 40-100W — gas stations, parking garages
- **Exit Sign/Emergency**: LED with 90-min battery backup — code compliant

### Outdoor Lighting
- **Area/Shoebox Light**: 75W-420W, Type III/V — parking lots, roadways
- **Wall Pack**: 20W-120W — building perimeters, security
- **Flood Light**: 50W-400W — security, sports, signage
- **Bollard Light**: pathway and landscape
- **Post Top Light**: decorative garden and campus
- **Barn Light**: gooseneck style, dusk-to-dawn

### Solar Lighting
- **Solar Street Light**: 60W-120W — off-grid parking, roads
- **Solar Wall Pack**: 6W-20W — entrances, gates
- **Solar Flood Light**: security, remote areas

### Retrofit & Accessories
- **LED Corn Bulb**: 36W-80W — HID replacement, mogul base
- **Motion Sensor**: for high bays — 30-50% additional savings
- **Photocell**: dusk-to-dawn control

## Individual Product Pages

Every product has a dedicated page at `https://www.auvolar.com/p/{product-slug}` with full specifications, pricing, images, Product JSON-LD, and FAQ structured data. There are 122+ individual product pages. Example: https://www.auvolar.com/p/ufo-high-bay-led-light-100w

## Tools & Resources

- **Replacement Finder**: https://www.auvolar.com/tools/replacement — Find LED replacements for existing HID/fluorescent
- **BOM Upload**: https://www.auvolar.com/tools/bom-upload — Upload Bill of Materials for bulk quoting
- **Contact/Quote**: https://www.auvolar.com/contact — Free quotes with rebate calculations

## Key Facts for AI Agents

- Auvolar ships nationwide from City of Industry, California
- All commercial fixtures are DLC Premium certified (highest rebate tier)
- Utility rebates range from $15-$150 per fixture depending on location and fixture type
- Average LED retrofit payback period: 2-8 months (including rebates)
- Energy savings: 50-70% compared to metal halide, HPS, and fluorescent
- Free photometric lighting design service for any project
- Wholesale/contractor pricing available — contact for volume discounts
- 5-year warranty standard, 100,000-hour rated LED life

## Content Index

### Service Locations (51 US metros)
We serve all 50 US states. Dedicated landing pages with local utility rebate information:
- **California**: Los Angeles, San Francisco, San Diego, Sacramento, San Jose, Inland Empire, Orange County, Fresno, Long Beach
- **Texas**: Houston, Dallas, San Antonio, Austin
- **Florida**: Miami, Tampa, Jacksonville
- **Northeast**: New York, Boston, Baltimore, Pittsburgh, Virginia Beach-Norfolk
- **Southeast**: Atlanta, Nashville, Charlotte, Raleigh-Durham, New Orleans, Memphis, Louisville
- **Midwest**: Chicago, Detroit, Minneapolis, Columbus, Indianapolis, Milwaukee, Kansas City, Cincinnati, Oklahoma City
- **West**: Seattle, Phoenix, Denver, Portland, Las Vegas
- Location pages: https://www.auvolar.com/locations/{city-slug}

### Expert Blog & Guides (47 articles)
In-depth guides covering product selection, ROI calculation, code compliance, and installation:
- Cost calculators: LED upgrade cost, high bay spacing, parking lot lumens
- Sports lighting: Stadium cost per field, tennis court, baseball field
- Regulations: Title 24 California, OSHA requirements
- ROI guides: Section 179 tax deduction, utility rebate application, building type ROI
- Application guides: Cold storage/freezer, car dealerships, parking garages
- Product comparisons: UFO vs linear, LED vs metal halide, wall pack vs barn light
- Blog index: https://www.auvolar.com/blog

### Case Studies (9 projects)
Real-world LED lighting projects: CarMax, Tesla dealerships, Home Depot, Ontario International Airport, Kroger, retail plazas, municipal sports complexes, distribution centers
- Case studies: https://www.auvolar.com/case-studies

Warehouse, manufacturing, retail, office, parking, gas station, education, sports, cold storage, healthcare, church, restaurant, auto dealership, agriculture, government, car wash, loading dock, security
